The link points are linked to your membership so if you are using the FairPrice app  just select the option to redeem when you are showing your QR code. If you are using the membership card  just tell the cashier that you wanna redeem the points. If you are using self checkout  can either select redemption of points on the terminal or select it via the mobile app
You can also offset your meal purchase at fp kopitam food court. Must use fp app to pay. There is a slider in the app.
